definition: Changbai or Baekdu mountains 白頭山|白头山, volcanic mountain range between Jilin province and North Korea, prominent in Manchu and Korean mythology

sentences.english: Florogeography of vascular plants in alpine tundra of the Changbai Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 長白山高山凍原維管植物區系地理。

sentences.english: It is a region inhabited by an overwhelming majority of the Korean minority nationality in China.
sentences.chinese: 長白山區，是我國朝鮮族同胞的主要聚居地。

sentences.english: There are abundant wild aromatic plant resources in Changbai Mountains, where the climate is temperate.
sentences.chinese: 長白山區屬溫帶氣候，野生芳香植物資源十分豐富。

sentences.english: Wang(Papaveraceae) is a valuable drug in Changbai Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 的乾燥塊莖，是長白山區珍貴藥用植物之一。

sentences.english: There is abundant wild pestkilling plant resources in Changbai Mountains, where the climate is temperate.
sentences.chinese: 長白山區屬溫帶氣候，野生殺蟲植物資源十分豐富。

sentences.english: The Changbai Mountain looks like a the chaotic world in prehistoric times, has a kind of mystical color.
sentences.chinese: 長白山像個混沌初開的世界，有一種神祕色彩。

sentences.english: Vegetation characteristics and functional division of Tricholoma matsutake habitat in Mt.
sentences.chinese: 研究了長白山松茸發生地的植被特徵及功能分區。

sentences.english: Changchun and its majestic surroundings will put tourists on top of the world.
sentences.chinese: 長白山及其宏偉的周邊將會使遊客欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: The grape is a pure natural, pollution-free specialty precious Changbai Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 所用葡萄是純天然，無污染的長白山脈珍貴特產。

sentences.english: The climate of Changbaishan is Alpine Climate of monsoon types in the temperate zonal continent.
sentences.chinese: 長白山是溫帶大陸季風型高山氣候。

sentences.english: This article discussed the distribution of major and trace elements of peat in Yuanchi, Changbai Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 探討了長白山圓池泥炭常量和微量元素的分佈規律。

sentences.english: The area covered by Changbai Mountains has a temperate climate and is rich in officinal plants.
sentences.chinese: 長白山區屬溫帶氣候，野生藥用植物資源十分豐富。

sentences.english: This is a little pretty girl, named Lele, who went to the Changbai Mountain together with me.
sentences.chinese: 這是同去長白山遊玩的一位小美女，名叫樂樂。

sentences.english: Roads: Chang Bai Shan Road connects Shuang Yuan Road.
From the snow-capped Changbai Mountains down to the vast South China Sea frontier.
sentences.chinese: 從白雪皚皚的長白山下到遼闊的南海邊疆。

sentences.english: The legal representative has engaged in wild ginseng of Changbai Mountain for forty years.
sentences.chinese: 企業法人從事長白山山參研究有四十多年的實踐。
